name: Alpha Five Library
summary: Library referenced by Alpha Five, an IDE that enables users to develop Web applications; created, along with .ADB , .ALB , and .ALX files, as a database for tables, sets, and other objects that make up the application; contains scripts , menus, toolbars, bitmaps , user defined functions and import definitions utilized by more than one table.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
